Description:
Modern Gem With Spectacular Views
This home has been engineered and constructed under the guidance of Ballarat University, which reassures any purchaser that this home is: top class, accurate and offers complete attention to detail from start to finish. Just three years old, this country residence offers a contemporary design throughout with three spacious bedrooms, a large open plan kitchen, dining and living area, along with a generous family bathroom and independent laundry.
With natural gas connected, this home offers natural gas cooking, wood heating in the living room plus a split system for extra convenience and ambient temperature control. Floor to ceiling windows provide plenty of natural light to filter through, whilst the neutral palette and cosy carpet form an easy and manageable combination of textures and warmth. A full width veranda to the front provides the perfect spot to relax and unwind, or head out to the massive elevated, split level rear deck which offers the perfect place to relax while overlooking the oval and natural bushland. A natural gas point is already installed to get your BBQ or outdoor heater up and running.
This sloping 650m2 allotment offers new colorbond fence and the additional under house storage creates extra features when storing or setting up children's play equipment. With some established trees and new plantings already taking shape, this property provides a private parkland right in your own backyard. Various walking tracks and St George Lake are virtually on your doorstep, which ensures plenty of attractions to keep family and friends entertained all year around. Just moments from the centre of Creswick and just 15 minutes to Ballarat city, this home would be absolutely ideal for first home buyers, retirees or just to downsize. Call our agent today for further details and inspection times.
Insights: 56 Melbourne Road, Creswick VIC 3363 was last sold in 2015 and 45 other 3 bedroom house in Creswick have recently been sold.

Description:
Brilliant New 4 Bedroom Home
This brand new 4 bedroom home is located in a sought after location on a level block of land. This new design features a formal entry, spacious open plan living areas including a separate lounge room, magnificent kitchen with stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry which adjoins the tiled family/meals area with a sliding door leading outside to a paved alfresco area. All of the bedrooms have built in robes, whilst the master has an ensuite and a walk in robe. Complete with a double garage with remote and direct entry into the home, gas heating, all floor coverings, fences, drive, basic landscaping, blinds throughout, TV antenna, clothesline, fly wire screens and more. Just move in and enjoy.

Description:
The Perfect Design
Perfectly located in the Lilium Estate is this well designed new family home. The home features a large modern kitchen with walk in pantry that overlooks the tiled family/meals area with a sliding door leading outside to an undercover paved entertaining area. The home also features a separate rumpus room. All 4 bedrooms are generous in size and feature built in robes whilst the master has a full ensuite and a walk in robe. The garage is remote control and has direct entry into the home. Built as a turn key property, this home comes ready to move into and is complete with all floor coverings, roller blinds to the windows, fly wire screens, basic landscaping, fences, driveway, clothesline, TV antenna, letterbox and more. Ideal for the owner occupier or the astute investor.

Description:
Large Living in Lilium
This ready built brand new family home is located in a sought after area on a slightly elevated block of land. This popular 4 bedroom design features a tiled entry with direct access into the garage, wonderful kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a large walk in pantry with an adjoining meals/living area and a separate lounge/theatre room. All of the bedrooms have built in robes, whilst the master has an ensuite with double vanities and a walk in robe. Complete with a large paved alfresco area perfect for outdoor entertaining. Built ready to move straight into, the home comes with all floor coverings, fences, driveway, gas heating, window blinds, clothesline and much more. Don't delay, make your enquiry today.

SOLD OFF THE MARKET
UpHill proudly presents this brad new family house in thriving suburb of clyde.
Light and bright interior comprises a master bedroom with walk in robe, three more bedrooms with built in robes serviced with a main bathroom and a separate toilet. An open plan living, dining finished with elegant kitchen, an additional living/rumpus area provides ample space to spend quality family time. Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 or Ravi on 0444 522 762 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Ray White is proud to present this outstanding block of land which is one of the last blocks on the street in the sought-after Pavilion Estate in Clyde. Build your dream home on 392m2 of prime soil in a central location that offers convenience, security and leisure!
Take advantage of Stamp duty savings, First home buyer grant, HomeBuilder grant and build your dream home.
Ideally nestled close to all amenities, you are within minutes to Shopping on Clyde, St. Peters College, St. Thomas The Apostle Catholic Primary School, Childcare Centres, Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Selandra Rise Community, local parks and public transport.
Call Ben Jusufi or Burak Gul for any further information!

Description:
Fresh As A Daisy
Come enjoy this fresh 2018 built 3 bedroom home that sits on a comfortable 375m2 block of prime land situated in the sort after Hartleigh Estate, Clyde.
This thought out floor plan offers buyers 3 comfortable sized bedrooms, with the master boasting a full ensuite & WIR, whilst the other 2 bedrooms conveniently have BIR and are tucked away from the master bedroom providing young parents privacy away from the kids.
The highly sought after second living area will provide a separate retreat away for the kids to play while the parents can enjoy their quiet time in the family room enjoying a movie. Overlooking the generous family room is a well appointed kitchen and meals area that receives lots of natural light.
The kitchen has all the modern accessories any discerning buyer could want including a Stainless Steel 900mm gas upright cooker, rangehood, stone benches, ample fridge space and a dishwasher to make life that little bit easier.
Outdoors has been tastefully built with a gorgeous decked Alfresco area to enjoy family BBQ's under, while you oversee the kids playing in the backyard.
At such a young age with so many extra's, you're sure to want to add this to your inspection list as it won't disappoint. Call Metin today on 0439 955 526 to arrange a private viewing.
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Stunning Early 1900s Cottage
Step back in time with your chance to purchase a piece of history, with one of Clydes original properties. Sitting proudly on a glorious 1,272m2 allotment in the very heart of town, this fine example of a period home exhibits features such as Baltic pine floor boards, beautiful open fire places and soaring high ceilings inside, and wide shady verandahs and expansive lawn outside. Beautifully renovated, and oozing charm and character rarely seen in todays housing, your investment is also protected by a Heritage Overlay. The home features a formal lounge room, meals area, 2 spacious bedrooms, family bathroom, plus separate 2nd toilet, and an updated kitchen built around the original stove. The site now has all services, and the property also offers modern conveniences such as ducted heating, dishwasher, and split system air conditioning (games room). Vehicle accommodation and storage space for equipment are well catered for, with a double carport, workshop and a garage measuring approximately 8 x 6m, whilst a versatile loft with bathroom and kitchenette can be used as rumpus/games room, home office or guest room. So much on offer and so much more potential to make it your own.
Insights: 20 Railway Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020 and 1 other 2 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Open Plan Living
Perfect for the growing family or the astute investor is this brand new family home located in the sought after Lilium Estate. There are 4 bedrooms with the master at the front of the home with an ensuite with double vanities and a walk in robe and the remaining 3 bedrooms all with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom and a rumpus/living area also located in this section of the home. Ready to move into with a long list of inclusions, this home should be high on list to inspect.

Description:
MODERN SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME!
Attention all First Home Buyers: you may be eligible for a First Home Owner Grant (FHOG). If you are eligible you will receive $10,000 and First-home buyer stamp duty exemption.
Well located study/ Living space to the front of the home with the potential to convert into a fifth bedroom.
Once you step inside your new home, you will be immediately impressed with luxurious interior comprising four bedrooms master bedroom well positioned providing privacy with walk-in robes and lavish en-suite and the remaining three generous sized bedrooms with spacious built in robes.
Flowing from the hallway to the heart of the home is an expansive open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The kitchen is complete with modern stainless-steel appliances 900mm five burner cooktop, oven and range-hood, dishwasher, stone bench tops and abundance of bench space and storage.
Centrally located bathroom and ducted heating throughout, split system cooling and double lock up garage with internal access for your convenience.
Conveniently located in Belmond on Clyde, has everything a family needs with only a short walk to Bona vista rise park. This property comes complete with quality and design!
Featuring:
- Master with luxurious ensuite and walk in robe
- Built in robes to remaining bedrooms
- Stone bench tops to kitchen, bathroom and ensuite
- Modern kitchen overlooking the tiled meals and living zone
- 900 mm five burner cooktop, oven and dishwasher
- Ducted heating throughout and split system cooling
- Double garage with internal access

Description:
Brand New Gem On Jubilee
Sprawled across a generous 400m2 piece of land, the home has both privacy and entertainment flowing throughout with an abundance of space, featuring quality tiles, high ceilings and large windows bringing an abundance of natural sunlight internally. Spectacular family/meals area incorporating a superbly appointed kitchen with Caesarstone bench, stainless steel appliances and a large pantry. Additional kids living area means space for everyone to enjoy, undercover alfresco area - perfect for indoor/outdoor enjoyment and relaxation. A low maintenance backyard completes this family home. Complemented by four impressive bedrooms, master suite with walk in robe and ensuite complete with stone bench tops, three remaining rooms all with large built in robes serviced by the central main bathroom. Other comprehensive appointments include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, spacious laundry, double garage with internal access, an abundance of storage and much more. Whether it be upsizing for that extra living area, downsizing with a low maintenance yard, a sure investment with capital growth or a fantastic first home this property will be appreciated by all. Contact Ryan for more information today.

MODERN CHARM!
In the quiet surrounds of the Hartleigh Estate, located in one of Clydes up and coming estates, sits this immaculately presented family home.
Built by Fairhaven Homes with a functional floorplan and entertaining in mind.
A stylish kitchen with stone bench tops and quality appliances makes entertaining a breeze, whilst the large open plan living and meals area is light filled and central to the design, opening to a covered outdoor entertaining area perfect for use year round.
Comprising of four bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, each of the remaining bedrooms is of generous proportions and feature built in robes.
With extras such as tinted front windows for additional privacy, split system cooling, ducted heating and a five-kilowatt solar system, and generous sized garden shed this home has everything you need.
Dont miss your chance, enquire today!

In light of the current COVID-19 situation, this property may be inspected by appointment. We have implemented safety procedures for the wellbeing of all. These include social distancing, use of hand sanitizers and no unnecessary hand contact with surfaces within the property. Please discuss any concerns you may have before arriving at the inspection.

Description:
GORGEOUS 4 BED BRAND NEW FAMILY HOME!
SOLD OFF THE MARKET
Pavilion Estate - Live next to Casey Fields.
Attention all First Home Buyers: you may be eligible for a First Home Owner Grant (FHOG). If you are eligible you will receive $10,000 and First-home buyer stamp duty exemption.
Be the first to call this Brand New property home. This beautiful high quality finished home features; Four robed bedrooms, the master suite complete with WIR and ensuite, two bathrooms, open meals and family area, modern kitchen, double remote garage with internal access. Whether you're buying your first home, investing or downsizing this is the perfect property!
Featuring:
- Bright master with ensuite and walk in robe
- Built in robes to remaining bedrooms
- Stone bench tops to kitchen, bathroom and ensuite
- Modern kitchen overlooking the tiled meals and living zone
- 900 mm five burner cooktop, oven
- Ducted heating throughout
- Double garage with internal access
- Low maintenance garden
Pavilion Estate offers a thriving location, within walking distance to shopping on clyde, Pasadena shopping Centre, Casey Fields Sports complex and St Peter's College, Admire the abundance of parklands and enjoy the countless recreational facilities.
Choose from an array of childcare, primary and secondary school education options. As well as Enjoy easy access to major road networks and public transport. Other nearby amenities include the Royal Botanical Garden, Cranbourne Shopping centre and Cranbourne Train Station.
To book an inspection please contact us today!

Ready to move into with a long list of inclusions, this home should be high on list to inspect.

Brand new Henley built in Edgebrook estate!!
Located in much sought after Edgebrook estate , this house provides a perfect family life style. Edgebrook is carefully designed by reputed developer stockland to meet family lifestyle, livability and convenience, with walking tracks, dog parks and picturesque Clyde Creek running through middle of the estate and surrounded with all necessary amnesties, edgebrook is the place to call home.
Built by reputed Henley homes, together with 50 years of experience and long structural guarantee Henley homes gives a great peace of mind when you make life time decision.Home's free flowing interior comprises Master bedroom with ensuite & walk-in robe, two more bedrooms with built-in robes serviced with main bathroom. An open plan expansive kitchen overlooking Dining and living area.
Other inclusions
- LED downlights

If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 or Ravi on 0444 522 762 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
** UNDER OFFER/UNDER CONTRACT **
EDGEBROOK ESTATE, CLYDE: Looking for a brand new home without the hassles of dealing with a builder? Wanting a modern contemporary residence? Searching for a popular up and coming location? Keen to add to your expanding rental portfolio? Then look no further, your wish is my command!
This is practical, spacious family living at its best - a complete turn key package nestled on a low maintenance, care free parcel of land. Perfect for first home buyers looking to make use of the Government grants, investors seeking long term capital growth and empty nesters wishing to downsize into a secure amenity filled location.
The functional floor plan includes 4 genuine robed bedrooms, the master with a full ensuite and walk-in robe, a family bathroom with separate bath/shower facilities plus a hostess kitchen. Not forgetting the spacious open plan family/meals zones, the remote single lock up garage with convenient internal walkway access and the cosy courtyard.
Complete with a long list of extras including:
- Gas ducted heating
- 3.5kW split system air-conditioning unit
- Floorboards to all walkways, carpeted bedrooms
- Downlights to the main living area
- Kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and 900mm rangehood/cooktop/oven
- 20mm stone bench tops to the kitchen and both bathrooms
- Standard roller blinds
- Instantaneous/solar hot water service
- Turn key options including landscaping to both the front and rear yards, coloured concrete driveway, letterbox and a wall hung clothesline
Whether you are a young couple looking to break into the market, an established family needing extra room or someone who's seeking a lifestyle change it's all here at this thriving new development. Within Edgebrook there are planned parks with playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks. It's an estate where community spirit will thrive. This vision will come to life with a carefully designed masterplan and future central park. Planned creek-front walkways and bikeways within the estate will encourage active lifestyles, whilst there are countless recreational and sporting facilities nearby.
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this outstanding opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and the Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre which offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
DISCLAIMERS:

Due to private buyer inspections, the status of the sale may change prior to pending Open Homes. As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.

Description:
THE PERFECT STARTER
The home will impress from the outset with classic façade and low maintenance gardens. The home has been designed to flow effortlessly with an open plan design incorporating both indoor and outdoor living. The heart of the home is the main living and dining zone which boasts natural light and even has a skylight for added light coming in. Overlooking this zone is the gourmet kitchen with island benchtop, an abundance of storage space and stainless steel appliances.
Sliding doors lead out to the large undercover alfresco and deck all enhanced with manicured gardens, perfect for entertaining all year round.
The master bedroom is conveniently located at the rear of the home and features walk in robe and its own full ensuite. All additional bedrooms include BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom which has been finished with quality fixtures and fittings.
Added features of the home include single remote controlled garage, split system heating/cooling, ducted heating, laundry and much more!
Situated in the Pasadena Estate, the location of this home is just a stones throw from the Shopping on Clyde hub and close to public transport, prestigious schools, Casey Fields and both townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. Do you not miss your chance to own a dream home like this!
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
** Please be advised due to Stage 4 Covid 19 restrictions we're unable to conduct Private Inspections until further notice, but we encourage you to register your interest now so we contact you immediately to arrange a private inspection once restrictions are lifted**

Description:
GORGEOUS 4 BED BRAND NEW FAMILY HOME!
Pavilion Estate - Live next to Casey Fields.
Attention all First Home Buyers: you may be eligible for a First Home Owner Grant (FHOG). If you are eligible you will receive $10,000 and First-home buyer stamp duty exemption.
Be the first to call this Brand New property home. This beautiful high quality finished home features; Four robed bedrooms, the master suite complete with WIR and ensuite, two bathrooms, open meals and family area, modern kitchen, double remote garage with internal access. Whether you're buying your first home, investing or downsizing this is the perfect property!
Featuring:
- Bright master with ensuite and walk in robe
- Built in robes to remaining bedrooms
- Stone bench tops to kitchen, bathroom and ensuite
- Modern kitchen overlooking the tiled meals and living zone
- 900 mm five burner cooktop, oven
- Ducted heating throughout
- Double garage with internal access
- Low maintenance garden
Pavilion Estate offers a thriving location, within walking distance to shopping on clyde, Pasadena shopping Centre, Casey Fields Sports complex and St Peter's College, Admire the abundance of parklands and enjoy the countless recreational facilities.
Choose from an array of childcare, primary and secondary school education options. As well as Enjoy easy access to major road networks and public transport. Other nearby amenities include the Royal Botanical Garden, Cranbourne Shopping centre and Cranbourne Train Station.
To book an inspection please contact us today!
Please note: that Inspection times and availability dates are subject to change or cancellation without notice

Description:
Great Value in Clyde
This brand new house and land package is located in a sought after area on a level block close to all services. The popular 4 bedroom design features a tiled entry with direct access into the garage, wonderful kitchen with walk in pantry and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher with an adjoining meals/living area and a separate lounge/rumpus room. All of the bedrooms have built in robes, whilst the master has an ensuite with double vanities and a walk in robe. The garage is remote control and has direct entry into the home. Built as a turn key property, this home comes ready to move into and is complete with all floor coverings, roller blinds to the windows, fly wire screens, basic landscaping, fences, driveway, clothesline, TV antenna, letterbox and more. Ideal for the owner occupier or the astute investor.
